name: Dr. Maria Rodriguez
bio_short: Leading researcher in food systems data and agricultural technology. Author of multiple publications on digital agriculture standards.

name: Sarah Chen
bio_short: Executive Director of IC-FOODS with 15 years of experience in food systems research and nonprofit leadership.

name: John Smith
bio_short: Senior advisor at USDA focusing on agricultural data standards and interoperability frameworks.

name: Lisa Wang
bio_short: Director of standards development at GS1, specializing in supply chain identification and traceability.

name: Michael Rodriguez
bio_short: Program Manager coordinating field programs and community engagement initiatives.

name: Dr. James Wilson
bio_short: Professor at MIT researching innovation in food systems and agricultural technology.
